name: 1+1 Media Group

name: 20th Century Studios
description: 20th Century Studios is a film studio headquartered in Burbank, California. The company was originally founded as Fox Film Corporation in 1935 by William Fox. It underwent a rebranding to 20th Century Fox in 1935 and was later renamed 20th Century Studios following its acquisition by The Walt Disney Company in 2019. The studio produces and distributes films, with notable franchises including "Avatar," "Star Wars," and "X-Men." 20th Century Studios utilizes advanced film production technologies and has developed a substantial library of intellectual property over its history. The target customer segments include general moviegoers, streaming service subscribers, and international audiences. The geographic markets served by the studio encompass North America and various international territories. The business model primarily revolves around film production and distribution, generating revenue through box office sales, home entertainment, and licensing agreements. Major clients include theaters and streaming platforms that showcase its films. The studio has established key partnerships with distribution companies and has a presence on digital platforms for film sales. Recent strategic moves include the release of new titles and ongoing franchise expansions. As of the latest updates, 20th Century Studios has a significant headcount, reflecting its operations in film production and marketing. The studio competes with other major film studios, including Warner Bros. and Universal Pictures, in the highly competitive entertainment industry. The financial metrics related to revenue and valuation are not publicly disclosed in the available sources. 20th Century Studios continues to innovate and adapt within the evolving landscape of film and media.

name: RTBF (La Radio-Television belge de la Communaute francaise)
description: RTBF (La Radio-Télévision belge de la Communauté française) is a public broadcasting organization headquartered in Belgium. name: RTE
description: RTE international is a consultancy and engineering company that specializes in electricity transmission. The company also focuses on the optimization and digitalization of network maintenance and offers support for IT tools related to electricity networks. name: RTL
description: RTL Group is a leading entertainment brand in Europe, headquartered in Luxembourg. The company was founded in 2000 and is a subsidiary of Bertelsmann SE & Co. KGaA. name: RTL Group

name: Altice
description: Altice USA, Inc. is a telecommunications and media company headquartered in Long Island City, New York. It was founded in 2013 by Dexter Goei, who serves as the CEO.
